name: twisted-spoon
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Psychic moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Psychic-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that boosts PSYCHIC- type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that boosts PSYCHIC- type moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A spoon imbued with telekinetic power boosts PSYCHIC-type moves.
